title: Who does the Composing for Riot?
body:
So, every patch, we usually get some cool new music to go along with the login screen, and I was just wondering who composed and/or played it.

It can't be easy producing this high quality stuff every two weeks, so I just wanted to find out who did it and thank them.

Because it is pretty awesome.

And if you work on the music, and you're reading this, thank you.

replies.body: Thanks very much for the kind post & we're glad you enjoy the music! There's a team of us that write the music for League & we all have our own projects, but provide feedback/support to one another so we're able to make the best tunes we can.

Do you guys use a program to make stuff, like LMMS? Or do you guys have live musicians?

Curious.

There's a music department made out of various people who compose, mix, write, record etc. They may probably hire freelance instrumentalist and singers every once in a while, but as far as composing goes, it's all in house Riot employees. I don't know any of them by name other than EdTheConqueror.  Nonetheless, I agree, they are all super-duper skilled.
That's awesome!! My 3 favorite are jhin kindred and rework swain! But they're all great!
